host.name: Codesmith
host.misc: Parking is available on the street

speakers.title: How launching Icecomm on HN created the most curious chat roulette ever (and how you can too)
speakers.name: Will Sentance
speakers.description: Icecomm lets you take full advantage of WebRTC in under 10 lines of frontend javascript. Learn how to use Icecomm to build a multiway video chat app in minutes without worrying about backend code. To get us started I'll explain some Icecomm basics, we'll live code the video chat app together and we'll even give you a sneak peak of a brand new Icecomm SDK that lets you add video and audio chat right inside emails

speakers.title: UX for Developers
speakers.name: Calley Nye
speakers.description: What good is it to make an app if no one will use it? This talk will aim to demystify the broad discipline of user experience, and introduce some core concepts and methods. These concepts will help you develop a useable application, acquire users and keep them coming back for more.

speakers.title: Module of the Month: ReactPivot
speakers.name: David Guttman
speakers.description: Module of the month is a segment that highlights one of the many npm modules that make Nodejs so great. This months module is ReactPivot
